// Extended colors are still using the "legacy" palette
const extendedColors = {
    COBALT1: "#1F4B99",

    VIOLET2: "#752F75",
    VIOLET3: "#8F398F",
    VIOLET4: "#A854A8",
    VIOLET5: "#C274C2",

 * Blueprint 5.x "modernized" colors
 */
